post.author: Admin
post.title: Marching Band CD/DVD
post.description:
Hello Band Families!
Preserve the memories of this fantastic marching season!
The Band Boosters
post.content:
Hello Band Families!

Preserve the memories of this fantastic marching season!

The Band Boosters in conjunction with Soundwaves and Jumpstart Videos will be offering both CDs of the Final Marching Band Concert and DVDs of our State Contest Performance for purchase.

The Marching Band Concert CD will include the pre-game performance, half time music, competition music and the marching cadence. Plus a printed insert listing of all performers will be included.

The State Contest DVD will be THE ONLY VIDEO PRODUCED OF OUR MARCHING BAND AT STATES! Because of the changing copyright laws, you can ONLY purchase the video from the Boosters.

The Boosters will have a limited quantity available and are only taking orders through NOVEMBER 3rd. THIS IS THE CUTOFF DATE FOR ORDERS!

Click to download the order form for your purchase! Please return to the white band box by November 3rd!

Questions? Contact: Amanda Kost --- 440-864-6543
